data.route_analysis: Guatemala offers accessible roads and public transportation, with buses and shuttles connecting major cities and attractions.
data.pricing_trends: Prices vary by season, generally higher in peak months (December and January) and lower in the off-peak season.
data.seasonal_patterns: Optimal months for visiting are from November to April, avoiding the rainy season.
data.booking_windows: Best to book 2-3 months in advance for optimal prices, with last-minute deals occasionally available.

destination_insights.route_analysis: Guatemala offers accessible roads and public transportation, with buses and shuttles connecting major cities and attractions.
destination_insights.seasonal_patterns: Optimal months for visiting are from November to April, avoiding the rainy season.
destination_insights.climate: The climate is mild, with temperatures ranging from 60째F to 80째F (15째C to 27째C). Light layers and rain gear are recommended during the rainy season.
destination_insights.culture: Guatemala is rich in Maya culture, showcasing traditional festivals, crafts, and architectural marvels.

market_insights.pricing_trends: Prices vary by season, generally higher in peak months (December and January) and lower in the off-peak season.
market_insights.booking_windows: Best to book 2-3 months in advance for optimal prices, with last-minute deals occasionally available.
market_insights.demand: Demand is particularly high during holiday seasons, with travelers showing interest in cultural experiences and natural wonders.
market_insights.competition: Key competitors include Costa Rica and Mexico for eco-tourism and cultural experiences.

trend_insights.market_trends: The trend of sustainable travel is growing, with more travelers interested in eco-friendly accommodations and activities.
trend_insights.consumer_behavior: Travelers are increasingly using social media for trip inspiration and planning, heavily influenced by reviews and recommendations.
trend_insights.competitive_landscape: Guatemala is positioning itself as a top destination for heritage tourism, competing with nearby countries for cultural travelers.
trend_insights.seasonal_factors: Travel choices are significantly influenced by the dry and rainy seasons, with more travelers preferring the dry months.
